tool_description:
Convert videos and images into neural art in realtime.
NeuralPainting is an HTTP REST API to convert image and videos into neural art, out-of-the-box.
name: Neural Painting
title: Neural Painting

api_list.name: Get Styles
api_list.description: List all the style options available. Also list the "styleKey" which needs to be passed onto image or video endpoint to specify the kind of style to be applied. The response contains canonical title and the original style image.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://neuralpainting.p.rapidapi.com/styles"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "neuralpainting.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://neuralpainting.p.rapidapi.com/styles"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "neuralpainting.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
